entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:21 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:21 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
